descripcionAceiteCannabis: JB Oil 25% is a CBD-rich oil from the new JB OIL line! In JB Oil 25%, we find a high concentration of CBD, made possible by innovative methods of extraction and dilution of the substance using only exceptional organic raw materials. Through supercritical CO2 solvents, isolated CBD is extracted, which is then mixed with MCT coconut oil (obtained through cold extraction) to obtain the final product that is completely odorless and colorless. The combination with coconut oil gives it a delicate and interesting flavor. In this way, Justbob, whose ultimate goal is to maintain high quality standards in each of its products, manages to include in its catalog a potent and natural oil, whose beneficial properties remain intact. Our practical and versatile JB Oil will be able to provide you with an intense feeling of pleasure to enjoy moments of pure relaxation.
Muchas_Gracias: Thank you very much for your purchase, enjoy your natural care
